Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to operating historical horse racing products
Summary: Authorizes the operation of historical horse racing; provides for the payment distribution of all pari-mutuel handle derived from historical horse racing.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to operating historical horse racing products
